org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.spark.plan

Class DotSparkPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.impl.plan.PlanDumper<E,P,S>
      • org.apache.pig.impl.plan.DotPlanDumper<SparkOperator,SparkOperPlan,DotSparkPrinter.InnerOperator,DotSparkPrinter.InnerPlan>
        • org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.spark.plan.DotSparkPrinter

  • public class DotSparkPrinter
extends DotPlanDumper<SparkOperator,SparkOperPlan,DotSparkPrinter.InnerOperator,DotSparkPrinter.InnerPlan>
    This class can print Spark plan in the DOT format. It uses clusters to illustrate nesting. If "verbose" is off, it will skip any nesting in the associated physical plans.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DotSparkPrinter.InnerOperator
      Helper class to represent the relationship of inner operators
      static class  DotSparkPrinter.InnerPlan
      Each spark operator will have and an inner plan of inner operators.
